name: Commercial real estate loan indicator derivation rule
description: This derivation rule aims to obtain the Commercial real estate loan indicator from its building blocks.
algorithm:
SET CMMRCL_RL_ESTT_LN_INDCTR = 
      CASE
        WHEN TYP_CLLTRL = 10 OR PRPS = 13
        THEN 1
        ELSE 2
      END;

logical_transformation_rule.algorithm:
SET BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.CMMRCL_RL_ESTT_LN_INDCTR = 
      CASE
        WHEN BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.TYP_CLLTRL = 10 OR BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.PRPS = 13
        THEN 1
        ELSE 2
      END;
